title: Call for the art enthusiasts at Beverly Gardens - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Call for the art enthusiasts at Beverly Gardens Published on : Friday, October 2, 2015
Between October 17 to October 18, 2015, four blocks of historic Beverly Gardens Park will become the place to be for art enthusiasts, food truck fans and anyone looking to enjoy the day outside at the Beverly Hills artSHOW. The two-day show is one of the city’s many tributes to arts and culture and attracts over 240 international and domestic artists who showcase and sell their artwork.
Art pieces on display and for sale come in various mediums including, watercolor, paint, jewelry, sculpture and pottery. All featured artists staff their booths throughout the weekend so they may provide details on the pieces they create and the inspiration behind them.
The art show attracts as many as 50,000 attendees, including Southern California art dealers searching for new art to add to their collections. The Beverly Hills artSHOWis family-friendly, free to attend and also features food trucks, beer and wine gardens, children’s art stations and live music.
The Beverly Hills artSHOW takes places across four linear blocks of historic Beverly Gardens Park in the heart of Beverly Hills. The event runs along Santa Monica Boulevard from Rodeo Drive to Rexford Drive
